ygData.subject: Re: Mistmoore raid (E'ci server)
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow.. This sucks.  No way I can get on the game untill around 8:30pm.  Plus I m in South Karana.  I d need a teleport.  Who schedules these things anyway?  :)
ygData.messageBody:
Wow.. This sucks. No way I can get on the game untill around 8:30pm. Plus I'm in South Karana. I'd need
a teleport. Who schedules these things anyway? :)


"Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" wrote:

> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> For the E'ci bards:
>
> Yesterday I posted about an event I'm trying to schedule in Mistmoore.
> Thats still in the works. Wanted to let all the E'ci bards know that there
> is a raid scheduled tonight in Mistmoore (6PM PST). Bextrii is running it
> and if you don't know her she knows a lot about conducting raids in MM. If
> you don't have a gypsy lute yet, tonight would be a good opportunity for you
> to get one for free (assuming bards camping the castle don't need one).
>
> Galtin of E'ci
> 30 bard
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
